metadata.description:
This is easily my favourite song I've made this year, and to stay thank you for all of the support over the last 12 months since I started releasing NFT's, I'm giving it away for free.

Escape was finished while I was travelling around Japan (currently still am). Inspiration can come from anywhere, in this case it was travelling around on busy subway trains/shinkansen or walking throuhg ancient shrines/temples - the raw emotion shows through the music.

Enjoy, and thanks again for the support <3
metadata.name: escape #1
metadata.title: escape
